text: Good Housekeeping an American and British lifestyle media brand. It covers a wide range of topics from home decor and renovation, health, beauty and food, to entertainment, pets and gifts. On May 2, 1885, Clark W. Bryan founded Good Housekeeping in Holyoke, Massachusetts as a fortnightly magazine. The magazine became a monthly publication in 1891. Category:American women's magazines Category:Monthly magazines Category:Fashion magazines
title: Good Housekeeping
